Package jchain.tests

Class MiningHarnessTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • jchain.tests.MiningHarnessTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Publisher<Transaction>
    public class MiningHarnessTest
extends java.lang.Thread
implements Publisher<Transaction>
    Test harness for mining. Implements the Publisher interface for pushing transactions to subscribed miners.
    Since:
    4/21/2019

      • run

        public void run()
        Overrides run defined within the Thread class. Sets up a miner, subscribes it, generates transactions, transactions and broadcasts them to the subscribed listener.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
